dcterms:creator: E. Dai
S. Wang
dcterms:description: The Pokec_n dataset is derived from Slovakian social networks and includes various features for each individual, such as gender, age, educational background, and geographical region. In this study, the geographical region is considered a sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: Pokec_n

dcterms:creator: E. Dai
S. Wang
dcterms:description: The NBA dataset consists of data from 403 professional basketball players, including features such as age, nationality, and salary. In this study, nationality is treated as a sensitive attribute, while the target label focuses on predicting whether a player's salary is above or below the median.
dcterms:title: NBA

dcterms:creator: I.-C. Yeh
C.-h. Lien
dcterms:description: The Credit dataset provides insights into consumer behavior, including features such as spending habits and credit history. The primary objective is to predict credit card default, with age identified as the sensitive attribute.
dcterms:title: Credit
